properties.dmlInsert: INSERT INTO "ITSOWNER"."TBL_VMS_DEVICE" ("UID", "DEVICE_ID", "DEVICE_NAM", "DESCRIPTION", "DEVICE_TP", "LINK_ID", "ORIENTATION", "IP_ADDRESS", "PORT", "LOCATION", "WIDTH", "HEIGHT", "PIXELS_X", "PIXELS_Y", "CTRL_MODE", "LIGHT", "LIGHT_ADJ", "DIS_INTERVAL", "START_DT", "END_DT", "DEFAULT_FONT", "DEFAULT_FONT_SIZE", "WORD_DIS_TP", "WORD_DIS_INTERVAL", "POWER_OFF", "LIGHT_OFF", "MANU_ID", "SHAPE", "STATUS", "CREATE_DT", "CREATE_BY", "UPDATE_DT", "UPDATE_BY", "VERSION", "ERROR_CODE", "TUNNEL", "ANGLE_PARAM", "INSTALL_PHASE", "NOTIFY_STATE", "AVAILABLE", "OLD_STATUS", "OLD_ERROR_CODE") VALUES ('${UID}', '${DEVICE_ID}', '${DEVICE_NAM}', '${DESCRIPTION}', 'P16', '${LINK_ID}', '${ORIENTATION}', '${IP_ADDRESS}', '${PORT}', '${LOCATION}', '${WIDTH}', '${HEIGHT}', '${PIXELS_X}', '${PIXELS_Y}', NULL, '50', '0', '45', NULL, NULL, NULL, '32', NULL, '10', NULL, NULL, '${MANU_ID}', ${SHAPE}, '0', sysdate, 'system', sysdate, NULL, '11', NULL, NULL, NULL, '4', '0', '0', '0', NULL);
